about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: From software to hardware, energy to AI—we are building the engineering and technology group of the future.
about.p1: Heptapus is a collective that set out with the goal of becoming the engineering and technology group of the future, uniting diverse fields under one roof. We are not just a software team, but a vision-driven community aiming to operate across a wide spectrum, including hardware development, artificial intelligence, energy systems, financial technologies, cyber security, and industrial design.
about.p2: Today, we work as a product-oriented technology team; tomorrow, we aim to transform into a Heptapus Group composed of companies operating in different sectors. By establishing an extensive ecosystem ranging from software studios to hardware workshops, and research centers to venture incubators, we plan to bring innovation, engineering, and entrepreneurship together.
about.p3: The long-term vision of Heptapus is to provide global-scale products and services in strategic areas such as sustainable energy, AI, biotechnology, digital identity systems, and smart infrastructure. Our goal is to transform our journey, which began with a local idea, into an international technology and engineering group.
about.p4: Every step we take today lays the foundation for tomorrow's Heptapus Holding vision. For us, engineering is not just about product development; it is about creating new value chains, bringing different sectors together, and shaping the future of society.
about.mission_p: To create a technology group that generates value and offers sustainable solutions across various sectors with an interdisciplinary engineering approach.
about.vision_p: To become a holding company that unites software, hardware, AI, energy, finance, and manufacturing technologies under one roof on a journey from local to global.
about.values_p: Innovation, trust, transparency, interdisciplinary collaboration, sustainability, ethical engineering, and global impact.

timeline.event: The Heptapus vision was born. First team members came together.
HeptaWare software studio company began operations.
First products developed. Group structure was shaped.

privacy_page.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_page.intro: At Heptapus Group, we take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This policy explains how your data is collected, used, and protected.

sections.p: We collect information such as your name, email address, and message content submitted through contact forms. Technical data automatically sent by your browser (IP address, browser type, visited pages) may also be processed.
Collected data is used to respond to your requests, improve service quality, and fulfill legal obligations. Your data is not shared with third parties.
Our site uses technical cookies to remember your language preference and theme settings. These cookies do not constitute personal data.
Your data is protected with modern encryption and security measures. Regular security audits are conducted against unauthorized access.
You have the right to access, correct, delete, and restrict the processing of your data. You can contact us through our contact form to exercise these rights.

terms_page.title: Terms of Use
terms_page.intro: By using this website, you agree to the following terms and conditions.

sections.p: This website is operated by Heptapus Group. All content on the site is for informational purposes and may be changed without prior notice.
All content, design, logos, and visuals on the site are the intellectual property of Heptapus Group. They may not be copied, distributed, or used for commercial purposes without written permission.
Heptapus Group does not guarantee the accuracy of information on the site. It cannot be held responsible for direct or indirect damages arising from the use of the site.
This site may contain links to third-party websites. Heptapus Group is not responsible for the content of these sites.
These terms may be updated without prior notice. The current version will always be published on this page.

sustainability_page.title: Sustainability
sustainability_page.subtitle: Responsible technology, sustainable future.

pillars.title: Green Engineering
pillars.desc: We design energy-efficient systems from the ground up. Our hardware and software solutions minimize resource consumption while maximizing performance.

pillars.title: Circular Economy
pillars.desc: We prioritize recyclable materials, modular designs, and long-lifecycle products. Our engineering practices reduce waste at every stage.

pillars.title: Global Responsibility
pillars.desc: Operating across multiple technology sectors, we maintain strict environmental standards and contribute to open-source sustainability initiatives.

pillars.title: Innovation for Good
pillars.desc: From AI-optimized energy grids to smart agricultural solutions, we channel our R&D toward projects that create measurable environmental benefit.

sustainability_page.commitment_text: At Heptapus Group, we are aware of the environmental and social impact of technology. We are committed to conducting our activities in line with sustainability principles and leaving a better world for future generations.
sustainability_page.cta_title: Let's Build a Sustainable Future Together
